title: Briahna Joy Gray Politely Disagrees with Chomsky on Voting Biden - Liberals Lose Their Minds!
description:
Zac & Gavin react to the hilarious freakout on Twitter from liberals over a recent episode of Briahna Joy Gray and Virgil Texas' podcast where they debated Noam Chomsky on his "vote blue no matter who" messaging this election cycle.
